title: Inclusion complex of quercetin with sulfobutylether β-cyclodextrin: preparation, characterization, antioxidant and antibacterial activities and the inclusion mechanism
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9472-9481
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08936C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kunkun Dai, Jiayi Wu, Xinyang Liu, Suilou Wang, Yihang Liu, Hehe Li, Haixiang Wang
Sulfobutylether β-cyclodextrin can significantly improve the antioxidant and antibacterial activities of quercetin through the formation of an inclusion complex, and their interactions have been elucidated.
